com.samsung.samm.common

Class SObjectImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.samm.common.SObject
      • com.samsung.samm.common.SObjectImage

  • public class SObjectImage
extends SObject
    Class for exchanging image object data.
    Since:
    S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0

    • Field Detail

      • SAMM_IMAGESTYLE_STAMP

        public static final byte SAMM_IMAGESTYLE_STAMP
        The stamp type of the image style.
        Only available in applications that support internal image resources, for example, ChatOn. The number of the internal stamp resource is referred to by the getAdditionalValue() method.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SAMM_IMAGESTYLE_ANIMATIONICON

        public static final byte SAMM_IMAGESTYLE_ANIMATIONICON
        An animated icon type of an image style.
        Only available in applications that support internal image resources, for example, ChatOn. The number of the internal animated icon is referred to by the getAdditionalValue() method.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SAMM_IMAGESTYLE_NORMAL

        public static final byte SAMM_IMAGESTYLE_NORMAL
        The standard image style.
        If you select this style, you must set the image file or bitmap.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SAMM_IMAGESTYLE_VIDEO

        public static final byte SAMM_IMAGESTYLE_VIDEO

        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.3, SAMM Library 1.7
        See Also:

      • SAMM_IMAGESTYLE_CUSTOM

        public static final byte SAMM_IMAGESTYLE_CUSTOM
        The custom image style.
        The image style to be used by the application for a special purpose.
        Available if you use a custom appliction image resource. The style of a custom appliction image resource is referred to by the getAdditionalValue() method.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SObjectImage

        public SObjectImage()
        Constructs an image object.
        Since:

      • SObjectImage

        public SObjectImage(int nContentsQualityOption)
        Constructs an image object.
        Parameters:
        nContentsQualityOption - Contents quality option (SOptionSAMM.SAMM_CONTENTS_QUALITY_MAX, SOptionSAMM.SAMM_CONTENTS_QUALITY_MEDIUM, SOptionSAMM.SAMM_CONTENTS_QUALITY_MINIMUM, SOptionSAMM.SAMM_CONTENTS_QUALITY_ORIGINAL)
        getImageBitmap(int nMaxWidth, int nMaxHeight) When called, it returns a bitmap that is resized according to the selected content quality option.
        When using the default constructor instead, the content quality option is set to SOptionSAMM.SAMM_CONTENTS_QUALITY_MEDIUM.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.2, SAMM Library 1.4

    • Method Detail

      • setStyle

        public boolean setStyle(int nStyle)
        Sets the style of the image object.
        Parameters:
        nStyle - Image style
        SAMM_IMAGESTYLE_NORMAL, SAMM_IMAGESTYLE_STAMP, SAMM_IMAGESTYLE_ANIMATIONICON, SAMM_IMAGESTYLE_CUSTOM
        Returns:
        False if the specified style is not predefined
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0

      • setImageBitmap

        public boolean setImageBitmap(Bitmap bm)
        Sets the bitmap image of the image object.
        The image style must be set to SAMM_IMAGESTYLE_NORMAL.
        Parameters:
        bm - image
        Returns:
        True for success. False for failure.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0

      • getImageBitmap

        @Deprecated
public Bitmap getImageBitmap(int nConstraintWidth)
        Deprecated. 
        Gets the bitmap image data of the image object. If the bitmap image size is large, the use of memory is increased. It is best when the bitmap size is set appropriately, for example by using the canvas view width.
        If the bitmap is set by setImageBitmap(Bitmap bm), this method returns the bitmap
        Parameters:
        nConstraintWidth - Constrains the bitmap size (by width) to reduce the amount of memory used.
        If this value is 1, the original bitmap is returned. Otherwise, the returned bitmap is resized according to the nConstraintWidth value.
        It is recommended that you set nConstraintWidth between 20% and 100% of the canvas view width. For example, if the canvas view width is 800, set nConstraintWidth to between 160 and 800.
        If nConstraintWidth is less than 1, this method returns null.
        Returns:
        An image bitmap
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0

      • getImageBitmap

        public Bitmap getImageBitmap()
        Gets the bitmap image data of the public Bitmap getImageBitmap() image object.
        If a bitmap has been set via setImageBitmap(Bitmap bm), the bitmap is returned directly.
        If an image file path is set via setImagePath(String path), a bitmap is loaded and returned from the designated image file. The bitmap is, however, resized according to the set contents quality option before being returned.
        Returns:
        Image bitmap
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1, SAMM Library 1.3

      • getImageBitmap

        public Bitmap getImageBitmap(int nMaxWidth,
                    int nMaxHeight)
        Gets the bitmap image data of the image object.
        The returned bitmap is set via setImageBitmap(Bitmap bm) or setImagePath(String path) and resized according to the content quality option.
        If the content quality option set in the constructor is SOptionSAMM.SAMM_CONTENTS_QUALITY_ORIGINAL or undefined, the original image bitmap is returned.
        For other instances, nMaxWidth and nMaxHeight are used to resize the returning bitmap.
        Parameters:
        nMaxWidth - The maximum width of the returned bitmap. nCanvasWidth<=0 equals getImageBitmap()
        nMaxHeight - The maximum height of the returned bitmap. nCanvasHeight<=0 equals getImageBitmap()
        Returns:
        Image bitmap
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.2, SAMM Library 1.4

      • setImagePath

        public boolean setImagePath(java.lang.String path)
        Sets the image bitmap with a file path.
        The image style must be set to SAMM_IMAGESTYLE_NORMAL.
        Parameters:
        path - Image file path
        Returns:
        True for success. False for failure.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0

      • getImagePath

        public java.lang.String getImagePath()
        Gets the original image file path of the image object.
        The image style must be set to SAMM_IMAGESTYLE_NORMAL.
        Internal attachments cannot be opened in an external application through file associations. To open an internal attachment, you must copy it to an external path.
        Returns:
        The file path of the original image file
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0

      • isValidImage

        public boolean isValidImage()
        Checks if the bitmap/image path that is set as SObjectImage is valid.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the bitmap/image is valid
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.2, SAMM Library 1.4
